import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import moment from 'moment'; import { MDBContainer, MDBCol, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBLink, MDBBtn, MDBIcon } from 'mdbreact'; import './style.css'; class WeatherPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { city: this.props.match.params.city, weather: undefined, main: undefined, timezone: undefined, } } async componentDidMount() { await axios.get(`http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?appid=c49b25031ae4ce4bb2f5d377dfd184e5&q=${this.state.city}`) .then((res) => { const { weather, main, timezone } = res.data; this.setState({ weather, main, timezone }) }) } render() { const { city, weather, main, timezone } = this.state var newDate = moment(new Date(28800 * 1000)).format('MM/DD/YYYY'); console.log(newDate); return ( <>

{city.toUpperCase()} WEATHER

Date (mm/dd/yyyy) Temp(F) Description Main Pressure Humidity {timezone && timezone} {main && main.temp} {weather && weather[0].description} {weather && weather[0].main} {main && main.pressure} {main && main.humidity} GO BACK
); } } export default WeatherPage;
